mapper.select: SELECT DONATION_TBL.*, USER_TBL.*, DOG_TBL.*, DOG_FILE_TBL.* FROM DONATION_TBL LEFT JOIN USER_TBL ON DONATION_TBL.DONATION_USER = USER_TBL.USER_ID LEFT JOIN DOG_FILE_TBL ON DONATION_TBL.DONATION_DOG_NO = DOG_FILE_TBL.REF_DOG_NO LEFT JOIN DOG_TBL ON DONATION_TBL.DONATION_DOG_NO = DOG_TBL.DOG_NO WHERE DONATION_TBL.DONATION_USER = #{userId} AND DOG_FILE_TBL.DOG_FILE_ORDER = '1'
